attributes.review:
1. He has 25 rape allegations, including one with a minor and was associated with Jeffery Epstein. 
2. Called the corona virus a hoax and proceeded to handle the pandemic horribly. 
3. Mocked a handicapped reporter because he didn’t fit his agenda. 
4. Conservatives love to preach about he keeps promises but Mexico never payed for the wall and when he didn’t get enough funding he caused a government shutdown like a baby having a temper tantrum. 
5. Never released his tax returns after his campaign after many people accused him of tax fraud. 
6. Said that he is an expert on windmills and they cause cancer in the same speech. 
7. Accused obama that he was born in Kenya, but Kenya wasn’t even a country when Obama was born. 
These are just some btw , he is racist , incompetent, a rapist and is unfit for the job. I was a trump supporter at one time but then I educated myself and that is why I no longer support him.
attributes.title: Reasons why trump is a bad president

attributes.review:
Downloaded this app expecting a good app. Boy were my hopes wrong. I had to watch 6 youtube videos to understand it! a waste of time. 

Anyways, Black lives matter.
attributes.title: Unsatisfied.

attributes.review:
this app is terrible. It took about thirty minutes just to download, unacceptable. My phone started buggin out like crazy!! I got pop up ads on my home screen!! Making my iPhone look like an ANDROID 😡!!  And i don’t want to support  donald if he is going to RUIN my phone. (i’m NOT happy about this!!!!!)
    
      Not only that, when you open up the app it took forever for it to load up past the loading screen. At this point i was ready to give up, because c’mon you’d think that THE president would have a decent app.
attributes.title: if i could give it no stars, i would

attributes.review: This app shows support for a racist, sexist and bigoted dude who has nothing but daddy’s money and rape accusations. Please don’t ever get this app unless you want it to spread!

attributes.review: I thought this app would be helpful to educate myself, but it absolutely did not?  Needs several bug fixes.  Like wth is it with the whole “vote for djt”?  Like that’s not what apps should be for.  Absolutely disappointing 🧚

attributes.review: It took 27277228 days to download this is outrageous,how ever the app made this weird sound which made me deaf then I saw this weird orange on the cover and went blind!the sound also made an outrageous amount of poop burst off on ceiling!as cockroaches and rats came dancing and having a muckbang then the rats called all the pigeons and the pigeons flew in a flock around my house pooping everywhere!so I look for a reverse button but I didn’t find one but opening the app made it worse it blew up my phone and my phone legit screamed while blowing up!this is the worst app I don’t suggest it to ANYONE.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
